catalog_script_client.name: Autopopulate LO, CN, Email

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_f986951b93333110d0ac703efaba101b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Employee Seperation">b0cf0962937bb110d0ac703efaba1006</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:52d1112293bbb110d0ac703efaba10f3</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Autopopulate LO, CN, Email</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   var employeesysid = g_form.getValue('employee_leaving');
   var employgr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
   employgr.addQuery('sys_id',employeesysid);
   employgr.query();
   while (employgr.next()) 
   {
	g_form.setValue('location',employgr.location);
	g_form.setValue('contact_number',employgr.phone);
	g_form.setValue('email',employgr.email);

   }
  
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-23 03:56:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f986951b93333110d0ac703efaba101b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Autopopulate LO, CN, Email</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resource" source="x_994488_hr">c90746c593033110d0ac703efaba1028</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resource">c90746c593033110d0ac703efaba1028</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f986951b93333110d0ac703efaba101b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-23 03:56:58</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
